message: Vleka  Kewl!  Sicer bom sporbal jutr (hebeni dialup).  Audio Improvements:  * Realtek ALC655 codec support added * Fix for BSOD on loading DLS files * Reduced susceptibility to audio glitches under heavy system load; additional fixes for 6 channel GetPosition glitches * ASIO support for recording at sample rates other than 48kHz; lower and more predictable latency * Fixes for NOLF. The 3D minimum and maximum distance and the roll off factor were not being taken into account for air absorption. Also modified reverb gain so that the max distance was taken into account * Fix for EAX reverbs; initialized EAX reverbs to off when querying for the EAX listener interface; updated EAX property handlers to ignore invalid parameters instead of range limiting -- this matches Creative EAX behavior    Windows XP Driver Versions  * Audio driver 3.66 (WHQL) * Audio utilities 3.66 * Ethernet driver 3.63 (WHQL) * GART driver 3.34 (WHQL) * Memory controller driver 3.38 (WHQL) * SMBus driver 3.38 (WHQL) * IDE In-the-box driver 3.58 (WHQL) * IDE 2.0 NVIDIA driver 3.66 (WHQL) * Display driver 52.16 (WHQL) * Installer 3.77   Windows 2000 Driver Versions  * Audio driver 3.66 (WHQL) * Audio utilities 3.66 * Ethernet driver 3.63 * GART driver 3.34 (WHQL) * Memory controller driver 3.38 (WHQL) * SMBus driver 3.38 (WHQL) * IDE 2.0 NVIDIA driver 3.66 (WHQL) * Display driver 52.16 (WHQL) * Installer 3.77    Novi IDE driverji.

jaz sem novi na nforce2 pa me zanima kaj je najbolje: a)uninstal starih nForce2 driverjev in ne vem kolko krat reboot ali b)kar čez stare te nove nForce 3.13  Ne bi rad se spet zajebavo z instalacijo winsew.

Itaq da je najbolje dat najprej uninstall ter restart. Potem ti bo hotelo ponovno driverje za grafo, mrežno,... namestiti ob restartu, pa daš samo next pa ti posname dosedajšnje, pa istočasno posnemi 3.13 driverje ter restart, potem ti posname še nekaj driverjev (najde nove naprave), pa še 1x restart in to je to -- aja pa pod audio moraš potem dati hardware acceleration na ful, ker ti ga kar na eno opcijo manj da

No zdaj sem na nForcesHQ tale  prvi post prebral: If, like most enthusiasts.. you intend to tinker with various nforce drivers please remember that..as with previous UDP/Nforce drivers.. you MUST let Windows detect bits and reboot between uninstalling any older drivers and then installing newer ones. Not doing so will cause problems. It should go like this:   1. Uninstall all nForce bits.  2. Reboot.  3. Let Windows try to find, and fail, at all the nForce stuff.  4. Reboot.  5. Install the new nForce drivers.  6. Reboot.  7. Install the graphics drivers all by themselves.  8. Reboot.  Grafiko pa mi je itak od radeona   aja pa pod audio moraš potem dati hardware acceleration na ful, ker ti ga kar na eno opcijo manj da  we'll do
Takšne nastavitve za ATA so bile že v neki napol stabilni beta verziji 3/4 leta nazaj

Jaz sem naletel na naslednji problem(že nekaj časa nazaj pa do izpred dveh dni nisem imel rešitve) - če odinštaliraš nforce driverje verzijo 2.45 potem hitro ugotoviš, da po reštartu windows-ov izgubiš driverje za grafično in obenem možnost ponovne inštalaciije driverjev za grafično kartico. Ne pomaga niti ponovna inštalacija driverjev 2.45 (ne vem kako pa je z novimi 3.13). Izgleda da odinštalacijski program zbriše pomemben del registra . Če se komu pojavi ta problem naj naredi datoteko z naslednjo vsebino (.reg) in jo vnese v register:  Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00  [HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Class\{4D36E968-E325-11CE-BFC1-08002BE10318}] "Class"="Display" @="Display adapters" "Installer32"="Desk.Cpl,DisplayClassInstaller" "TroubleShooter-0"="tshoot.chm,tsdisp.htm" "Icon"="-1"

Sam sem se pred dnevi igral z nekimi driverji za sound. Mi zbriše dol nvidiene driverje, novih ne usposobim. Po nerdodnosti kliknem na inštalacijo 2.03. Uninstall, reboot, 640×400, naložim 2.45, dela vse kot mora. Pojma nimam, kaj vas muči? GPU je RV250.
@user: jest sm šu tud takoj po inštalaciji pogledat ide in zgleda da so zrihtal ravno to kar mi je delal probleme...bom zdele probal posnet en cd
naložo nove nForcere,vse dela OK,edino IP mi je zbrisalo in sem moral na novo vpisovat IP in druge cifre.če pa je kaki improvement v benchih pa bomo še vidli

@assistant_9, ti dela NeroImage Drive? meni z SW-IDE driverji ne dela pa hot swap na racku mi ne dela  ta SW-IDE je za en drek (kot vsi ostali prej) ziher ni dober - ce ga prevec obremenis, se vsipa ce pa delas osnovne stvari pa se vam seveda zdi dober plus to, da vam v Sandri navrze malo pik vec, kar pa nic ne pomeni
